name: The Sons of Niobe Being Slain by Apollo and Diana
description: The Sons of Niobe Being Slain by Apollo and Diana; Jan de Bisschop (Dutch, 1628 - 1671); Netherlands; about 1660 - 1670; Brown wash over black chalk; 24 × 40.8 cm (9 7/16 × 16 1/16 in.); 88.GA.54; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Sons of Niobe Being Slain by Apollo and Diana
